name: emoji-essential
description: An emoji dictionary directly from https://unicode.org/

scripts.build: electron build.js && npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm run min && npm test
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/index.js && echo 'module.exports = emojiEssential;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/index.js && echo 'export default emojiEssential;' >> esm/index.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
